images.nano_prompt: Using the original photo as a base, keep the same camera angle, walls, windows, and flooring. Remove all existing furniture and clutter. Brighten the room with soft natural-looking light. Repaint the walls to a neutral warm white. Add modern, mid-century style furniture scaled realistically: a low-profile sofa in light gray fabric, a simple wooden coffee table, a modern floor lamp, and a small accent chair. Keep the view out the windows unchanged. Make the room feel clean, spacious, and move-in ready.

Using the original photo as a base, keep the same camera angle, walls, windows, and flooring. Remove all existing furniture, personal items, and clutter. Brighten the room with soft natural-looking light. Add modern bedroom furniture: a platform bed with neutral bedding in white and gray, matching nightstands with simple lamps, and a small bench at the foot of the bed. Add a subtle area rug under the bed. Make the room feel clean, spacious, and move-in ready.

Using the original photo as a base, keep the same camera angle, walls, windows, cabinets, and flooring. The kitchen is vacant. Brighten the room with soft natural-looking light. Add modern kitchen staging: a simple fruit bowl on the counter, a small vase with greenery, and tasteful kitchen accessories. Add a pendant light above the island if there is one. Make the room feel clean, inviting, and move-in ready.
